title: ​19 questions you might be asking after seeing Steve Jobs
text:
​19 questions you might be asking after seeing 'Steve Jobs' 
Cnet Saturday 24th October, 2015 
You've just seen "Steve Jobs", the new movie about the life and times of Apple's divisive co-founder. The filmmakers have said the movie is a "painting, rather than a photograph". So, how much is real and how much is made up? The movie is based on Walter Isaacson's in-depth Jobs biography and screenwriter Aaron Sorkin's meetings with key figures in Jobs' life. Despite depicting many real people and events, the movie plays fast and loose with the details. Here are answers to some questions you might be left with after watching "Steve Jobs"....
